Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class SubSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.SubSceneController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionTileController, BaseProductionController, CofferController, DevelopmentGridCardController, DevelopmentGridController, DevelopmentSpaceController, LeaderController, MarketplaceController, OpponentController, PaycheckController, PlayersController, PopeFavorTilesController, UnassignedMarblesController, WarehouseController
public abstract class SubSceneController extends Object
Abstracts the concept of a sub-component inside a SceneController

      public SubSceneController()

  • Method Details

    • update

      public abstract void update​(int[] completeUpdate)
      Updates the component based of the slice of the model updated passed by the relative SceneController
      Parameters:
      completeUpdate - slice of the model updated passed by the relative SceneController

    • attachInterpreters

      public void attachInterpreters​(ControllerInterpreter ci, UserInterpreter ui, OfflineInfo oi)
      Attached all of the interpreters in a single call
      Parameters:
      ci - The controller interpreter used by this scene to communicate with other scenes and receive updates from the server
      ui - The user interpreter used by this scene to communicate with the server
      oi - Offline information used by the scene to retrieve key information offline, without overloading the server

    • setId

      public void setId​(String id)
      If this component has an ID, it can be set here
      Parameters:
      id - Component ID, to differentiate between similar scene components (for example the 2 leaders)

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the sub-scene, in particular the message label. This method is called when the scene is first created
